name: 2D Shooter (ripleyj2)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project. I plan on adding 3 modifications:

  1. Increasing the number of enemies as you move through levels
  2. Adding a "You Won" page after you beat level 3 that takes you back to the home screen
  3. Adding a better themed background to the main menu

Credits: 

Created by Joey Ripley
